description:
Port of Brisbane, the best career you never imagined. 

Embrace a truly diverse job working with a great group of people. Develop a career that means something, without sacriﬁcing life at home.  Oh, and enjoy the view.

A diverse operation, where every day’s different

We’re so much more than ‘just a port’. From marine operations and security specialists to property managers, strategic developers and administrative experts, our team is truly diverse.  Whatever your role, it’s likely no two days will be the same. The very nature of what we do means new challenges, new tasks and new projects are always on the horizon. As we innovate in a changing industry, we need people who get the job done and then help us do it better. Our best people do that every day.


An important job; a powerful purpose 

Your role at PBPL is vital for economic development and community services in Queensland and well beyond. The experience, skills and innovation of our team keep the Port of Brisbane running effectively, efficiently, safely and sustainably. Our work impacts on millions of lives. We are all so proud of what we do and why. 

A place where family matters too

We expect a lot from our people, who are committed and dedicated to our mission. But our teams tell us they really value the balance they can achieve between work and home life. From a family-friendly culture and work rosters to flexible work arrangements where possible, we’ll support you to bring your best, at work and at home.  


A welcoming, supportive culture

We really do have a great bunch of people, who want to be here! You’ll be welcomed and supported by your manager and your team to be the best you can be.  You’ll benefit from the know-how of our experienced long-termers, as well as the fresh perspectives and ideas of the new experts we’re bringing into the business.  And with a range of optional social activities on offer, you’ll build trusted relationships across the company.

​

A proud reputation; a bright future 

You’ll join a company proud to be renowned for best practice in our industry. As Australia’s Port of the Year 2017, we continue to invest in innovation and growth to move PBPL and the maritime industry forward.  Our continued success depends on the diverse skills, experiences and perspectives of our people. Join us and help us build a bright future for PBPL, for Queensland and for you.   


Port of Brisbane’s first Marine Cadetship Program for Women 

In June this year we launched our first Marine Cadetship Program for Women. We’re proud to be challenging misconceptions about the opportunities available within our industry, the nature of the work and the skills and perspectives required. It’s important to us that we attract a truly diverse workforce and we provide support for men and women to build a sustainable career. We’re honoured to have had so many talented women reach out to us to find out more about the Program and to hear their perceptions of our industry change. Listen to what they have to say. 


Ready? Let’s get started.
